title: Old diaries, 1881-1901 /
author: Gower, Ronald Sutherland
snippet: One day we visited the pretty gardens of the Artists' Club,called the " Mallerkasen," the scene of a pretty littlepicture by my artist friend, which I had got at theAmerican Exhibition. He called it " Al Fresco." Goethe's name is inscribed on one of the trees in thispark-like garden, which belonged then to a Herr Jacobs —a friend of the poet's.
